project.title: Everything But the HouseÂ® Whitepapers
project.problem: EBTH would like to gain more sellers for their auction platform by partnering with real estate agents. Agents can add to their service offering by providing whitepapers with tips and tricks for selling items in the midst of a move. These whitepapers should be well-designed using the EBTH brand.
project.solution: Various whitepapers using lifestyle imagery, a hierarchy of content, simple illustrations and hand-written text when applicable appeal to real estate agents and people selling their home. Clicks and shares on social media are improved over previous blog content.
